Articles.Content:
Hi,

Description of issue:

The screen keeps flickering in the menu whenever you move the mouse and once you enter the game it just keeps flickering non-stop. I tried recording the issue but it doesn't show on screen capture so this doesn't help.... I tried the exact same install on my laptop and there is no issue there leading me to believe it has something to do with this particular issue. Now, if I switch it out of fullscreen the issue is gone which leads me to believe it's driver/gpu related and possibly AMD specific, or monitor, but if it were the monitor wouldn't it also happen on my laptop which is also hooked up to the same monitor?

My current machine:

AMD 3600x
32gb ram (3600 mhz)
AMD rx5700XT
nvme drives

Laptop:

Dell XPS 17 9700
32gb ram 2999mhz
Intel i7-10875H
Nvidia RTX2060 max-q
nvme drives

Monitor:

Samsung C32HG70

 

I've tried googling the possible solution multiple times but I cannot find it as is so I'm asking for some help here. Any would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you,

Yorz

---EDIT----

I've attached a video which shows it but I'm not sure if it's my monitor whenever I put the video on fullscreen or not... Have a look yourself, it's quite subtle so you might have to watch it a few times to see it.

Thanks again.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5KpTb8JsfLU

Edited September 6, 2021 by Yorz

Problem solved!

It was AMD Freesync ultimate running on the monitor. I set it back to the standard one and it resolved my issues.

Hope this helps for others who might run into this issue.

Thank you
